About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I love learning new things that help me improve my skills and get me to the next level of my career. I am a passionate and an independent individual that can accomplish work with little to no supervision. As well as a good team player that cares about other people's well-being.

SKILLS

Front End: React/Redux, Sass, Bootstrap, Javascript, JQuery

Back End: Node Express, MongoDB, PHP Codeigniter, MySQL, Postman, Docgen

Others: Jest, Enzyme, Git, CircleCI, Heroku, Netlify, Digital Ocean, Xcode

ENTHEOS IT, INC. | APR 2015 - JUL 2015

Front End Development Intern

Helped build a magazine app for my college university which was our client. Used web technologies such as HTML, CSS, Javascript, PhoneGap, Baker Framework to build the app. (App link)

ENTHEOS IT, INC. | JUL 2015 - NOV 2016

iOS Development Volunteer

Helped build a pillar app for my college university which was our client. We used native technologies such as Xcode with Swift to build the app.

ENTHEOS IT, INC. | NOV 2016 – SEP 2018

Web and Mobile App Developer

Built some native iOS apps and helped build web backend api that were used on local competitions such Pumpkin Carving, Parade, Dance and Beauty Pageants. Technologies used were Xcode with Swift for the apps and PHP Codeigniter and MySQL for the web backend api. (Screenshots)
